page.title: 05A WORKING MUM IN SCREDINGTON
page.content: Today mum got up had breakfast,washed etc.and caught the the 8.30 bus into Sleaford to go to work at Eastgate training centre for the mentally handaycapped adults , where she works . Dad is at home to take us to school . She puts on her overall ,scraped (27Ib) potatoes ,and prepared 14 couliflowers . After a tea break my mum made the apple sauce and gravy and set the tables. At 12.30 she served dinner. Afterwards she washed up 85 place settings. Before going home she washed the floor. On the way home she shopped for groceries and changed her libary books. When she got home she prepared tea,fish chips and peas . After washing up she helped to bath 4 children gave us supper,fed the rabbit and sat down to watch the news and then went to bed.
